attributes.action: create a new medal for the whistleblowing soldier who exposed politicians sleaze
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A new medal to be commissioned in recognition of the soldier who blew the whistle and lead to the exposure of the theft from the public purse and the home flipping fraud by our elected politicians.
To be called the Politicians Medal in service of the public.
To be in fake gold to match the tarnished reputations of those who could not control their greed.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
